game.name: Everest: Real Climbing Simulator
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 레이싱, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 스포츠
game.shortDescription: World's first life-size 1:1 replica of Everest in a game. Climbing Mount Everest is a lifelong dream for many — but also the world’s most dangerous and costly challenge. Now, with this game, you can live that dream without risking your life or breaking the bank!
game.shortDescriptionEn: World's first life-size 1:1 replica of Everest in a game. Climbing Mount Everest is a lifelong dream for many — but also the world’s most dangerous and costly challenge. Now, with this game, you can live that dream without risking your life or breaking the bank!
